value.title: HappyFox applies conversational AI to support requests made via Slack
value.excerpt: HappyFox today announced it is using conversational AI to automatically resolve requests made to help or service desk platforms it supports via a Slack communications channel. Assist AI from HappyFox analyzes each request made via Slack to determine if a way to solve that issue already exists within an IT organization’s knowledge base.

value.excerpt: Microsoft has launched the Open AI Energy Initiative in collaboration with Shell, C3 AI, and Baker Hughes. It aims to offer AI-based scalable and interoperable solutions for the energy sector.

value.title: The two companies have announced a significant 6-year partnership

value.title: Weights & Biases raises $45M for its machine learning tools
value.excerpt: Weights & Biases, a startup building tools for machine learning practitioners, is announcing that it’s raised $45 million in Series B funding. The company was founded by Lukas Biewald, Chris Van Pelt and Shawn Lewis — Biewald and Van Pelt previously founded CrowdFlower/Figure Eight

value.title: Ford says ‘millions’ of its vehicles will run on Google’s Android starting in 2023
value.excerpt: Ford is the latest automaker to turn its vehicle operating systems over to Google. The Dearborn, Michigan-based company said it will use Google’s Android to power the infotainment systems in “millions” of its cars starting in 2023.
